column2: I have a dream inside me. i know i´m not alone. as i watch the sunset come down. children without a home. though your part might feel very small. it´s more than what it seem. you hold a peace of the answer inside. that´s very much in need.. All america, will be america. whole america.. One america, more america. than central, north and south. My america, your america. the old and the young. oh america, yes america. for all and all for one. whole america.. I pray some day that we´ll. wake up to find. we´ve lost no time. in finding our way. we´re getting closer everyday. i´m fighting for you. for our dreams. to come true...

Ah, life is a party. it´s a ride in your jeep. as sunsets the beach. it´s summertime. Ah, life is a good time. it´s the sun on the sea. the flavour is as sweet. as vanilla ice cream.. it´s affection a video game. there we´re up on the video screen. you´re the king and i´m the queen. you press a button to save me.. we are dancing no dancing wrong. we´re singing to favorite song. everybody can come along. jump on the table laugh all day long.

How great it´s to sing this song. ioioioia. with love and lots a good feeling.. this melody that we will sing from the heart. will help our love to start. this song of peace that we´re singing.. dancing and singing. we´re barefoot and playing. and having a wonderful time. our hands are open. so come on and hold them. join in the fun anytime.. i´ll sing this song. oooo. so everybody can follow. ooooo. this is our song of peace oooooo. and through it our love can flow.. i´ll sing this song. oooo. so everybody can follow. ooooo. this is our song of peace oooooo. and through it our love does flow.

i will paint a rainbow filled with energy. if will arch in the big sky for all to see. if we´re seperate or divided. we´ll have colors to unite us. we can be blend into a perfect harmony. when i paint with blue, i get tranquillity. i spread orange for friendships across the sea. with the deepen green we find the answers. to the questions that childreen ask us. so together we can be one color love. yellow so bright, it became the sun. violet, dark and beautiful. all the colors are in a rainbow. red, so intense, very mystical. purple glows, very magical. it´s complete, it´s a rainbow of love. All the colors we need. so we make up a rainbow of people. all the colors we need. and we make up a rainbow of people
